cards.description: something you say when you leave someone or when they leave you
used to tell someone that you are grateful because they have given you something or done something for you
something that you say to be polite when you are asking for something or asking someone to do something
used to agree with something, or to give a positive answer to something
something that you say in order to disagree, give a negative answer, or say that something is not true
to forgive someone for something that is not very serious
used to ask about the way something happens or is done
something you say to greet someone when you meet them in the morning
